text: is the 15th (16th overall) studio album by Chara, which was released on October 31, 2012. Cocoon was released in two versions: a limited edition CD+DVD versionhttp://www.yesasia.com/us/cocoon-album-dvd-first-press-limited- edition-japan-version/1031437664-0-0-0-en/info.html as well as a regular CD Only version.http://www.yesasia.com/us/cocoon-normal-edition-japan- version/1031437665-0-0-0-en/info.html The album was preceded by three singles: "Alterna Girlfriend", "Planet" and."Chouchou Musubi". "Planet" was used as the Sony "BRAVIA" commercial song and "Chouchou MusubI" was used as the theme song for the animated movie Fuse: Teppo Musume no Torimonocho. == Track listing == == Singles == {| class="wikitable" !Date !Title !Peak position !Weeks !Sales |- |June 6, 2012 |"Alterna Girlfriend" |align="center"|102 (Oricon) |1 | |- |August 1, 2012 |"Planet" |align="center"|105 (Oricon) |1 | |- |October 17, 2012 |"Chouchou Musubi" |align="center"|87 (Oricon) |2 |918 |} == Japan sales rankings == {|class="wikitable" !Release !Chart !Peak position !First week sales !Sales total |- |rowspan="3"|October 31, 2012 |Oricon Daily Albums Chart |align="center"|10 | | |- |Oricon Weekly Albums Chart |align="center"|20 |3,902 |6,039 |} == References == http://www.sonymusic.co.jp/artist/chara/discography/KSCL-2142 Category:Chara (singer) albums Category:2012 albums
